# addPower

**Instance Property**

The correction for nearsightedness.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var addPower: HKQuantity? { get }
```

## Discussion

This quantity uses [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/diopter()] units. The range is from 0.25 to 2.5. The right and left eyes should have the same value.

## Accessing lens specification data

- **sphere**: The correction for farsightedness.
- **cylinder**: Part of the correction for astigmatism that measures the strength of the correction.
- **axis**: Part of the correction for astigmatism that measures the orientation fo the correction.
